Name: Dr.Pumpkin
About the game: Helllo adventure, You had crashed landed into an island called 'Jamba Obobea' near a village. They had saved your live. You had with spent them a few days but someone did an experiment to take over the entire WORLD. It was a success he tested it on his self and he became Dr.Pumpkin if he catches you he can make more walking pumpkins Have FUN >:D The Goal: Your goal is to find the key as posable before Mr.Pumpkin man gets more walking pumpkins chasing you. Features - A walking pumpkin - Limited set of clues to travel the island - Access to the full game - Have a Walking Pumpkin man that will be chasing you around - New and free DLCs every month - Suggestions are open! Email me - Low Storage space needed! - Full Support and chatting Discord server - Tutorials - English Only game (English is the only language in this game)
